alibabaRegion.description:
The region of the Terraform backend where the state files are stored.
> **Important** > > - The default region is based on your Trend Vision One region.

roleArn.description: The Alibaba Cloud resource name (ARN) of the user role for Trend Vision One.

oidcProviderId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider.

name.description: The name of the Alibaba Cloud account to be used in Cloud Account Management.

description.description: The description of the Alibaba Cloud account.

name.description:
The name of the security services connected to the system.

Available values:
* `workload` - Server & Workload Protection

instanceIds.description: The instance ID of the associated security service.

connectedSecurityServices.description: The security service associated with the connected Alibaba Cloud account.
